name: UnionOperation
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  Result of parts that have been joined together into a single solid model.
description: |
  A UnionOperation is the result of individual parts that have been joined
  together into a single solid model through Studio's solid modeling Union
  tool, or through Class.BasePart:UnionAsync() or
  Class.BasePart:SubtractAsync().

  See Solid Modeling to learn more about
  Studio's solid modeling tools and methods.
